summary: We testified on federal efforts to counter scams before the Senate Special Committee on Aging. The statement is based primarily on the following report: CONSUMER PROTECTION: Actions Needed to Improve Complaint Reporting, Consumer Education, and Federal Coordination to Counter Scams Additionally, the statement discusses responses to previous recommendations we made to the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, the Federal Bureau of Investigation, and the Federal Trade...
title: Consumer Protection: Expeditious Actions Needed to Implement a Government-wide Strategy and Related Efforts to Counter Scams
